text: finding out about people can go mad for social reasons.

a young girl tried to put an end to her life because of lover's á

when i received the first year results as the first year had á

with a group of handicapped people we went to a party. when we á

when i decided to separate from my husband.

the day my parents were involved in a car accident and had to be á

my cassmate laughed at me when i was being scolded by the á

disgusted with boyfriend's mother - her overpowering, á

my wrong behaviour made my loved one feel sad and uneasy.
when i heard that my father had passed away.
i went home and visited with my family and friends.

when my cousin passed away during the holidays at home.  he fell á

a relative, whom i like very much, left for the united states.

two years ago my best friend died in an accident, just a day á

my apartment has had three robberies in the last month. the guy á

death of my father; he died of laryngeal cancer.

[ i had, by being silent, disapproved my love and made him á
unhappy.  he had not been able to keep his promise.  i thus was á

after i reluctantly refused to dine with a certain man on the á

letting jesus take control of my emotions i.e., ill feeling.

my life-partner, who was drinking more and more, spoke about á

heard some ghost-like noise at night.
earth crake.

for the sheer pleasure of it, i quarelled with my boyfriend who was trying  á

when some people, including me, are treated in a way which á

a quarrel with my mother because i thought she said very á

not doing well in the examn.

when i was back home after a long time, meeting beloved people á

i feel this emotion very often when i try to express my feelings á

finding out i am not good looking.

several weeks ago, i had problems with friends, i felt disgusted á

when i dreamed that i was being attacked by a friend.
when a friend of me came for an unexpected visit.

having agreed to share the taxi expenses, three people in the á

i saw a man falling on the walkway. he seemed half dead, and was á

i spoke to my mother on the phone.  she had skin cancer and was á

when i was very young, one day, i was in the street with my á
father and brother.   while my father was talking to some á
friends, i saw a dog and began to pat it.  my father told me á

one night, i went out with some friends for dinner and i did not á

i reproached my mother's cooking and criticised her á

when a friend carelessly broke and object in my parent's house á

when my husband discovered i was having an affair with another á

when i received my promotion letter.

i was at home, filling my tax report.  nobody had time to help á

when my dog ran out on thin ice last spring.
when i was molested by an old drunk man.
pictures of nazi extermination camps on a t.v program.

i left a boy with whom i was going around without giving him any á

when i moved away from home.

when i stole a book in class and the teacher caught me, the rest á

the 2nd time someone i had met cared for came over to my house i á

hearing about a friend back home that had to have his stomach á

my father is someone i disgust. so when he comes close to me á

i met a friend in a discotheque. he was with a girl and he told á

once my presentation was the worst among my classmates as i had á

when a class-mate died.
when i heard that my nephew had passed away.
after 3 weeks i saw my girlfriend again.

when i was in form 4, at secondary school, i was elected as a á

a sister broke a cup and when mother asked i was reported to have á

i went out dancing and found my boyfriend kissing another girl.

day before yesterday my mother bought me a new pair of shoes, á

liked the shoes and they made me feel that my mother cares for á

i was to be given an audition to get a role. i had a competitress á

i made my boyfriend so unhappy and depressed that i feel guilty.

it so happened that while staying at anaunt's place i discovered á

i criticised an action of my mother and for the first time she á

doing unexpectedly well in an examn.
when i was studying and someone disturbed me.

i felt disgusted when i was in a helpless position at the loss of á

car accident nearly occurred between us and drunk driver coming á

it was in march 1985 when one of my fellow students borrowed my á

when i left a carnaval ball at 4 o'clock a.m. i was alone in a á

when i was a child, i had a terrible nightmare with st. nicholas' á

when i did not succeed in finding a job after having finished a á

i saw a dog who was eating excrements.

a good friend, the wife of the vicar of my church came up to me á

left alone in the biology building surrounded by empty buildings.

i was walking down a little village at night.  there was nobody á

when i went out with my dog in a forest late at night when we á

on my birthday i got a present that i had desired for a long á

getting into this university to do medicine.
a party with friends on new year's eve.

getting a phone call from a very old friend.

one night, when i got out from the university i saw two strange á

after i left i discovered that the windshield was broken.

as a child - having a dog - it getting a disease and dying.

every time i was around this one person i would stick my foot in á

disgust - no. maybe it is more precise to say revultion at a worm á

i experienced it once when we were on a drive. our car passed by á

every time i imagine that someone i love or i could contact a á

there was a lot of irritation between me and a person who lives á

in an examination ,which other students found easy i could hardly á

article published.

i feel disgusted since i am unable to cope with all the wordly á

after an event in which i felt that i had acted unfairly.

with an alcoholic.

a conflict with a pupil and there were probatory teachers á

when i beat up my brother so badly, for not having gone to school, á

my dog of 16 and 1/2 years - "lord grey" died in his sleep - his á

i had told a person unpleasant things in a bad manner. he was á

when the gear broke on my car.

from the fact that my husband and i are not in good terms.

someone i do not like kept talking to me.
